DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics YM150 healthy make adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Investigate Effect Food Pharmacokinetics YM150 Tablet
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics YM150 healthy non-elderly adult male subject use 2×2 crossover design . Also , evaluate safety YM150 .
DOC.criteria: Body weight : ≥50.0 kg , < 80.0 kg BMI : ≥17.6 , < 26.4 Healthy , judge investigator subinvestigator base result physical examination lab test Received investigational drug within 120 day study Donated 400 mL whole blood within 90 day , 200 mL whole blood within 30 day , blood component within 14 day study Received medication within 7 day study A deviation assessment criterion physical examination laboratory test A deviation normal reference range coagulation test [ PT ( INR ) aPTT ] History drug allergy Upper gastrointestinal disease within 7 day study Concurrent previous hepatic , gastrointestinal , heart , cerebrovascular respiratory disease Concurrent previous malignant tumor Previous treatment YM150
